hero.title: Publish Your Tool on AI STAK
hero.description: AI STAK can help you reach millions of AI users and potential customers globally. Connect with AI enthusiasts, AI entrepreneurs, AI investors, VPs, and more to increase product awareness, trial rates, and paid users.

audience.title: Audience from 100+ Countries
audience.description: Most popular audiences are from USA, UK, Canada, China, Japan, Korea, India, France, Singapore...

backlinks.title: Get DR 60 Backlinks
backlinks.description: Get permanent high-quality high-power backlinks to increase visibility and authority of your website and products.

languages.title: Support 5 Languages
languages.description: Your product introduction will be spread in at least 5 languages, covering users from more countries, with more to come in the future.

pricing.title: Low Price, Permanent Exposure
pricing.description: We have multi-tier pricing to help startups save on promotion costs, and sponsors will get more homepage exposure!

items.question: When will [AI STAK] whitelist the tool?
items.answer: We will review your tool within 48 hours of submission.

items.question: What is the refund policy?
items.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with our service.

items.question: Can the submitted tool stay on the homepage forever?
items.answer: Yes, as long as your tool complies with our community guidelines, it will remain permanently on our platform.

items.question: What is the sponsorship policy?
items.answer: Sponsors receive priority placement, increased visibility, and exclusive promotional support.

items.question: Why isn't my submitted website showing on the page?
items.answer: All submitted websites go through a review process, which may take some time. If it's not showing after 48 hours, please contact our support team.
